patterns.text: My study plan spans 8 months
I'm committed to studying for 9 months
I have allocated 12 months for my studies
I intend to study for a short 3 months
I want to complete my studies in just 2 months
I'm considering a study duration of 6 months

responses: Your study plan is set for a duration of 8 months.
You're planning a short but intense study period of 3 months.
We can discuss a study plan that suits you.
nice! Let's explore your options.
No worries, we can adjust the plan based on your preferences.

patterns.text: I'll be studying 5 subjects
I'm planning to tackle 7 subjects
I have 3 courses to study
I'll study for 3 exams
I have 3 exams to study for
I need to prepare for 5 exams

responses: great!
awesome!
We can work it out :)

intents.tag: Number of Units in a Subject

patterns.text: This subject has 5 units to complete
I'm taking a course with 8 units
I'm not sure yet, maybe 3-4 units

responses: A subject with that many units means a structured plan; we'll create one.
Handling those units requires careful scheduling; we're here to assist.
No problem; we'll adapt based on the number of units you choose.

patterns.text: I usually spend a week on each unit
It takes me about 10 days per unit
I'm flexible, so maybe 5-7 days per unit

responses: that time per unit provides a good pace; we'll plan accordingly.
Allowing that many hourse per unit gives flexibility; we'll adapt the plan.
Flexibility is great; we can create a customized schedule.

patterns.text: I study for 45 minutes per hour
Each session is around 60 minutes
I prefer shorter sessions, 30 minutes per hour

responses: Studying for 45 minutes per hour is effective; we'll plan accordingly.
60-minute sessions can work well; we'll incorporate them into your plan.
Shorter sessions at 30 minutes each are manageable; we'll adapt the plan.

patterns.text: I have to study for Calculus
My exam is on Algebra
I need to work on my History project
Tomorrow is my Chemistry exam
I'm focusing on Biology
This week, it's all about Physics
I'll be preparing for the Physics exam
Time to study Geography
I need to finish my English project
Chemistry is on my to-do list
I'm focusing on Statistics
Working on my Math assignment
Preparing for the History test
Studying for the Biology quiz

responses: Noted, you'll be studying or working on {{subject}}.
Great, {{subject}} is on your agenda; we'll plan accordingly.

patterns.text: I can't study on weekends
Mondays and Wednesdays are unavailable for me
I have some flexibility; it varies

responses: Weekends off? No problem; we'll plan around your availability.
Noted, Mondays and Wednesdays are blocked; we'll create a schedule.
Flexibility is good; we'll adapt based on your varying availability.

intents.tag: Hours Unavailable for Studying in a Day

patterns.text: I can't study after 7 PM
Mornings are my study time; I'm not available in the evenings
I'm available all day; no specific restrictions

responses: No studying after 7 PM? We'll create a schedule accordingly.
Mornings work well; we'll plan your study sessions accordingly.
Great, your availability allows for a flexible schedule.

patterns.text: This is a one-time event; no recurrence
It's a weekly meeting, so it recurs every week
I'm not sure about recurrence; it may vary

responses: Got it, no recurrence for this event; we'll plan accordingly.
Weekly recurrence noted; we'll adjust the schedule for you.
No worries; we'll adapt based on the recurrence of your events.

patterns.text: Thanks
Thank you
That's helpful
Thank's a lot!

responses: Happy to help!
Any time!
My pleasure
